text: Margot Loyola Palacios (September 15, 1918 - August 3, 2015) was a Chilean musician, folk singer and researcher of the folklore of Chile and Latin America in general. Loyola was active as a musician and musical ethnographer/anthropologist for many decades. Loyola was born in Linares, Chile. Loyola died in Santiago, Chile at the age of 96. ==Other websites== Category:1918 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Singers from Santiago Category:Musicians from Santiago
title: Margot Loyola
